title: EcoAlert Frontend Testing
description: Comprehensive testing of the EcoAlert environmental monitoring application frontend

steps.stepDescription: Open the EcoAlert homepage and verify it loads correctly
steps.validation: Page title contains 'EcoAlert' and main navigation is visible

steps.expectedResult: Sign-in page loads with Clerk authentication form
steps.validation: Clerk sign-in components are visible and functional
Redirect to Google authentication page occurs

steps.stepDescription: Test dashboard loads after successful authentication
steps.validation: Dashboard components (charts, alerts, etc.) are visible

steps.expectedResult: Air quality chart displays data correctly
steps.validation: Chart renders with data points and legend
Map loads with pollution data and color coding

steps.expectedResult: Monitoring page loads with real-time data
steps.validation: Live sensor data updates and WebSocket connection active
All navigation items (Dashboard, Monitoring, Analytics, etc.) are clickable and redirect properly

steps.stepDescription: Test application responsiveness on different screen sizes
steps.expectedResult: Application adapts to different screen sizes
steps.validation: Layout adjusts properly for mobile, tablet, and desktop views
